lead_paragraph: President Nicolás Maduro of Venezuela and President Hassan Rouhani of Iran want OPEC members to cut production to increase prices as the cost of oil has plunged to less than $50 a barrel.
snippet: President Nicolás Maduro of Venezuela and President Hassan Rouhani of Iran want OPEC members to cut production to increase prices as the cost of oil has plunged to less than $50 a barrel.

keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Iran and Venezuela Push OPEC to Stabilize Falling Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: Iran and Venezuela Push OPEC To Stabilize Falling Oil Prices
